body:
Comment 2 by **xloogson**: 
not a vm

i'm modity /go/src/Make.inc and it's work ok.

ifeq ($(GOARCH),386)
O:=8
else ifeq ($(GOARCH),amd64)
O:=6
else ifeq ($(GOARCH),arm)
O:=5
ifneq ($(GOOS),linux)
$(error Invalid $$GOOS '$(GOOS)' for GOARCH=arm; must be linux)
endif
else
$(error Missing $$O for '$(GOARCH)')
endif




[root@SHO-TEST57 ~]# make -version
GNU Make 3.80
